attributes.action: Let the Prime Minister complete Brexit.
attributes.additional_details:
The 2016 Referendum gave the government an instruction to leave the EU. 
After 3 years this instruction has not been actioned.
The government can then focus on the urgent issues of the nation. Crime, Police, NHS etc
attributes.background: The country wants Brexit completed and the government to return to resolving much more important issues that require urgent attention to get Britain back to being a great nation.
